sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SANASHYGOTTA, a flourishing town of Bengal, in the district of Purneah, on the Mahanuddy river, much frequented by Hindu pilgrims on their route to the places of ablution in the Northern Mountains, from which circumstance it takes its name. Long. 88. 32. E. Lat. 26. 35. N.
